title: Chris Harris
description:
Chris Harris is a legend in the automotive world. Journalist, racer, he's worked for many a publication and is currently a host on Top Gear UK, the most popular car show in the world. 


Watch the show! https://youtu.be/hMjjQo5Yoic


Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @harrismonkey

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @harrismonkey

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
